0: I have stayed in rooms in the 50 per night range with better accommodations than this Hampton Inn
The breakfast served as part of the room price was hot and nurishing with a wide selection of choices
Room was neat and clean even smelled nice
We had a great view from our window of the Ohio River
Bedroom is well equipped and clean
Pros Clean and good shape rooms
The lobby was a great place to meet and eat outside of the room
Plenty of space to maneuver and an easy to use roll in shower
Rooms were clean and check in very quick
Staff moved us to a new room immediately and discounted our room charge
1: The thick window glass blocks the sound for a good nights sleep
it was in tinfoil and placed it up by the TV with note
Was enough room for a table and at least one more chair
Our room looked and smelled fresh and clean from the say we came to the say we left
In the area for a wedding reception and decided to book a room for both a romantic night out of the house away from the kids and to not risk driving impaired
We stopped and were greeted politely and checked into our room
This Hampton has the normal amenities breakfast and refrigerator
You stay at Hamptons because they offer a great breakfast with the room and this was no exception
The final issue on the AC heating unit was its functionality
Location was easy to get to but not a good view
2: Very noisy rooms have very poor sound insulation sounded like there were people in our room all night
Shower was n’t updated but it was very clean and had great water pressure
The room was too small for 4 people
The shower was difficult to use since room was handicap accessible
I left something behind in the room and did not realize it until I was almost home 5 hours away
The room was large enough to walk around the beds and have some room besides
I would stay here againThe room did nt have booklets pamphlets with info in the room like other hotels usually have
Aside from location the Individuals in the neighboring room were in and out with the door slamming shut until 2 in the morning and running up and down the hall
People sitting outside elevator rooms talking so loud
Bathroom sink drains were slow but not a major issue
